title: Closed to all your needs..Parks..School..Tranportation..Restaurants...
posting_body: ['Cherry Ridge Apartments in Aurora , CO', 'Come see why we are so popular!', 'Our spacious, well designed apartment homes have all electric kitchens stove, refrigerators, dishwashers, disposals, All homes have wall to wall carpet, window coverings and lots of closet space.', 'Select units have balconies and air conditioning units!', 'Our community features a huge heated indoor pool , sparkilng outdoor pool, Play ground, fitness Center and a great central Aurora location!', 'We also have laundry facilities, internet cafe and lots of off street parking.', 'Cherry Ridge is also located in the Cherry Creek school district.', 'Visit us today and find out why Cherry Ridge is a very special place to live!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Walk', 'In closets', '- Pets Welcome', '- Electric Stove', '- Large Bedrooms', '- Window Coverings', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Frost-Free Refrigerator', '- Vanity', '- Private Balconies/Patios(select units)', '- Carpeting/Vinyl', '- Dishwasher', '- Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities', '- Package Acceptance At The Office', '- 2 Sparkling Heated Swimming Pool', '- Easy Freeway Access', '- Laundry Facility', '- Zumba classes on property', '- Controlled Access Entry Building', '- Near Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '- Close to RTD-stops & park and light rail', '- 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '- Fitness Center', '- Convenient Location', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly (up to 2 pets 60 lbs or less combined)', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times more the rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 9-5 Saturday 10-4', 'Cherry Ridge', '919 South Peoria Street, Aurora, CO, 80012', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'R9hfY5Bhz0']
